ValidationRule.description: when users select the MS Hold Out checkbox they must supply an expiration date unless the permanent hold out description is Strategic Account Team
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( NOT(BEGINS($Profile.Name,"System Administrator")), MS_Hold_Out__c = true, ISPICKVAL( MS_Permanent_Hold_Out_Description__c,''), ISNULL( MS_Hold_Out_Expiration__c ), NOT ISPICKVAL(Permanent_Hold_Out_Description__c, "Strategic Account Team") )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: **** You are required to set the MS Hold out Expiration date when checking the Hold out checkbox ****
